programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs ir satriekts, jo atklājis, ka Mikija Mantla beisbola bumba ar autogrāfu, ko tēvs viņam bērnībā dāvājis, ir viltojums. Viņš sava izmisuma dēļ vēlas pateikt Alijai, ka Ziemassvētku vecīša nav.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds nokavē interviju ar Teriju Bredšovu, kurā paredzēts stāstīt par viņa grāmatas rakstīšanu, jo viņam ir jāaizved Elija un Maikls pie ārsta. Debra ir slima, un Marija nāk par viņu rūpēties.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Dunder Mifflin piedalās vidusskolas darba gadatirgū, taču maz skolēnu ir ieinteresēti. Džims, Endijs un Kevins spēlē golfu ar potenciālo klientu. Atgriežoties birojā, visi, izņemot Dvaitu un Andželu, dodas mājās.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls sarīko Tobijam ekstravagantu aiziešanas ballīti un iemīlas sievietē, kas viņu aizstās. Džims plāno ballītē bildināt Pemu, taču tas nesanāk. Atgriežoties uzņēmuma vadībā, Raiens tiek arestēts par krāpšanu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klērai nepieciešama ģimenes palīdzība, lai savā mājā saorganizētu Helovīna pasākumu. Džejs un Menijs izklaidējas uz Glorijas rēķina. Svētki Kameronam atsauc sāpīgas atmiņas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klēra un Heilija vienlaikus saslimst. Fils cīnās ar čirkstošu dūmu detektoru. Menijs nejauši atlaiž vienu no Džeja darbiniekiem. Kamerons vēlas dabūt Liliju televīzijas reklāmā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Stīvs un Mārsija nolemj, ka pietiks ar vienu reizi - viņi brīvprātīgi pieskata Kelliju, Badu un ģimenes suni Baku, kamēr Als un Pegija dodas nedēļas nogalē uz moteli Viskonsīnā. Tajā Als vēlas skatīties boksa maču kabeļtelevīzijā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kādu vakaru ls aizved Stīvu skatīties pokera spēli ar saviem pokera draugiem. Stīvs iejūtas spēlē un aizvieto vienu no kungiem, taču galu galā zaudē algu. Kopš tā laika Stīvs cenšas izvairīties no Mārsijas, lai nestāstītu viņai patiesību par naudas zaudēšanu, kamēr Als plāno izmantot savu laimestu 300 dolāru apmērā, lai iegādātos jaunu makšķeri.

programme.desc: Limstoka ir pilsēta ar vairākiem apkaunojošiem noslēpumiem, taču, kad Mona Simingtona izdara pašnāvību, miss Mārpla uzskata, ka šis gadījums nav tik pašsaprotams.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina atgriežas Tornfīldā pēc Misis Rīdas nāves, un Ročesters beidzot viņu bildina. Vai viņa piekritīs?

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Popzvaigzne un viņa rezerves dejotājs tiek nosisti ar elektrību, izpildot triku televīzijas mūzikas šovā, un Peregrīnas objektivitāte tiek pārbaudīta, kad viņas vecais draugs Ēriks tiek nosaukts par galveno aizdomās turamo šajā lietā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gvenda Holideja ievācas savā sapņu mājoklī, viņa sāk redzēt spokus. Pēc tam atklājas, ka Gvenda uzauga šajā namā — un mistērija kļūst draudīgāka.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Stāsts par 12 gadus senu vēsturi, kad Djūks un Elīza pirmo reizi satikās.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzas dzīvē viss ir kārtībā līdz brīdim, kad ierodas kāds paziņa, lai paustu šaubas par viņas lomu Nash and Sons. Djūks saņem piedāvājumu, kas izraisa attiecību krīzi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīze un Nešs joprojām nevar sastrādāties, kad saistībā ar kādu lietu ir jānonāk nozarē, kur cilvēki ir gatavi uz slepkavību, tikai lai saglabātu savus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tikšanās ar Ogdenu kādā krodziņā Mērdoks satiek populāru detektīvu, un jauna laimes meklētāja tiek atrasta mirusi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Vats mēģinājumus aizsargāt dārgu rubīnu, kas paredzēts jaunam muzejam, apdraud apņēmīgi zagļi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka sievietes nāve ir saistīta ar korumpētu mēra kandidātu, kam, iespējams, iepriekš izdevies izvairīties no atbildības par slepkavību.

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Kad Sisi uzzina, ka Francis ir izņēmis Rūdolfu no armijas, viņa atgriežas Vīnē. Tomēr atmosfēra ir visai nokaitēta, un arī noris sarunas par alianses veidošanu.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Kad Sisi uzzina, ka viņas dēlu ir nolaupījis strādnieks, kurš pieprasa imperatora nāvi, viņa dodas glābt Rūdolfu. Francis seko viņai pa pēdām.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Limstoka ir pilsēta ar vairākiem apkaunojošiem noslēpumiem, taču, kad Mona Simingtona izdara pašnāvību, miss Mārpla uzskata, ka šis gadījums nav tik pašsaprotams.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Greiema Kinga sieva Šērlija tiek noslepkavota sprādzienā, kas gandrīz prasa arī Peregrīnas dzīvību, izmeklēšana uzkarst un atklāj krāpniecisku darbību labirintu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai tiek uzdots atrisināt kāda augsta ranga privātā detektīva slepkavību, kura pagātne ir noslēpumos tīta.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Džeimss ir gandrīz iekārtojies jaunajā dzīvesvietā, ierodas Zigfrīda brālis Tristans. Zigfrīds ir priecīgs un lūdz Džeimsam ņemt līdzi Tristanu, lai pārbaudītu teoriju praksē.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Brakenreids ir pārsteigti, kad "Hamleta" aktieris viņu acu priekšā nomirst uz skatuves.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks izmeklē lidmašīnas katastrofu, kuras rezultātā gāja bojā pilots. Atklājas zemisks noslēpums, kas saistīts ar Džeimsu Pendriku.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Greiema Kinga sieva Šērlija tiek noslepkavota sprādzienā, kas gandrīz prasa arī Peregrīnas dzīvību, izmeklēšana uzkarst un atklāj krāpniecisku darbību labirintu.

programme.desc: Elīzai tiek uzdots atrisināt kāda augsta ranga privātā detektīva slepkavību, kura pagātne ir noslēpumos tīta.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc noziedznieku bēgšanas no cietuma un bankas aplaupīšanas Mērdoks un Krebtrijs mēģina tikt galā ar ziņojumiem par vīru ar šaujošu roku.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad jurista nāve tiek uzdota par suņa uzbrukumu, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka vainīgajiem ir vajadzīgs suns, kas mantojis milzīgu summu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kad pusaudži kādā bedrē atrod jaunas meitenes līķi, Dalgliešs un Miskina ierodas Norfolkā, lai palīdzētu, un galu galā tiek ievilkti lielākā slepkavības noslēpumā.

programme.title: "Tour of Luxembourg". Nīderanvena–Nīderanvena (26,3 km IT)
programme.desc: The Tour de Luxembourg is an annual stage race in professional road bicycle racing held in Luxembourg. The Tour de Luxembourg is classified as a 2.HC, the highest rating below the World Tour, by the Union Cycliste Internationale, the sports governing body. In 2006, the Tour became part of the UCI Europe Tour.

The results of each race are combined to determine three World Championships, riders, teams and manufacturers.

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: Cartel War
programme.desc: L.A. undercover cops disregard the law to bring down the most powerful drug mob in the United States. Loosely based on Mexicos once most powerful drug cartel leader, this journey into the drug underworld cuts to the bone and through the heart. Hard realities intertwine when an elite division of L.A. undercover narcotics cops, Division 123, begins to peel away the layers of a powerful drug cartel to undermine their manipulative influence. A study in humanity: of the cops and the challenge they face to balance a commitment to those they love, against their commitment to task and ability to protect. At one moment, immersed in the glitz of L.A.s glamor and the next, looping into the citys seedy underbelly, "DISRUPT/DISMANTLE" follows these officers as they go head-to-head with a ruthless yet seductive foe. Echoing the familiar scenario of cops vs. bad guys, this story presents itself with new vigor, fresh and focused on the lives of determined cops making choices - and mistakes. As the discovery of bodies begins to tarnish the investigation - including the brutal murder of one of their own, Division 123 disregards the law to bring down the most powerful drug mob in the U.S...

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Attrition
programme.desc: When a Thai girl with mythical powers goes missing, Axe and his old team unite in attempts to bring her back.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Fatal Sin
programme.desc: A boy and a girl fall in love. But on the night they met, she was drunk and stoned and he toke advantage of her. Although she does not remember almost anything from that night, she remembers something that may compromise their relationship.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Joel, the owner of an Extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

programme.title: Crown Vic
programme.desc: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel while hunting two cop killers on the loose.

programme.title: Kreilis
programme.desc: Billija Houpa dzīvē viss bija nevainojami - čempiona tituls, skaista sieva un mīļotā meitiņa. Taču vienā brīdī viss apgriežas ar kājām gaisā - traģiskos apstākļos iet bojā viņa sieva, diskvalifikācija ringā, pēc kuras viņu pamet menedžeris, nekādu ienākumu un viņam tiek atņemtas vecāka tiesības. Lai atgūtu visu, kas Billijam ir bijis dārgs, viņam ir jaatrod spēki uzvarēt sava mūža grūtākajā...

programme.title: Muļķu nauda
programme.desc: Parasts puisis iegulda savus iekrājumus videospēļu veikala GameStop akcijās un sāk par to rakstīt internetā. Kad viņa ieraksti sociālajos tīklos kļūst aizvien populārāki, un akciju tēma kļūst par kustību, visi kļūst bagāti - līdz pretī cīnīties sāk miljardieri.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pārgājiens Lahemā nacionālajā parkā.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.desc: Piecu saviesīgu notikumu laikā apņēmīgam vecpuisim jāapsver doma, ka viņš, iespējams, ir atklājis mīlestību.

programme.title: Ātrāk
programme.desc: 10 gadus pavadot cietumā, Braucējam ir bijis tikai viens mērķis - atriebt sava brāļa nāvi. Tagad viņš ir brīvībā un gatavs ķerties pie savas nāvējošās misijas, tomēr viņa ceļā stājas divi vīri - izbijis policists un jauns, egocentrisks slepkava.

programme.title: Malholanda ceļš
programme.desc: Uz līkumotā Malholanda ceļa Losandželosā naktī notikusi avārija. Bet, attopoties notikuma vietā, jauna sieviete neatceras neko, pat ne to, kas ir viņa pati. Viss šķiet mulsinošs kā sirreālā sapnī. Tāds apjukums, tik daudz neatbildētu jautājumu!

programme.title: Algotnis
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Džeimsu Hārperu pēkšņi atvaļina no dienesta ASV Jūras kājnieku korpusā, nepiešķirot izdienas pensiju, viņš pievienojas privātai paramilitārai organizācijai, lai gādātu par savu ģimeni vienīgajā veidā, kādā viņš to prot.

programme.title: Saules apžilbinātie
programme.desc: Filma "Saules apžilbinātie" ir par slavenību pāra, pazīstamas rokzvaigznes un režisora, atvaļinājumu un atveseļošanos saules lutinātā un nomaļā Itālijas salā. Atpūtnieku idilliskais miers tiek negaidīti iztraucēts, ierodoties rokzvaigznes bijušajam mīļākajam ar meitu. Tikšanās, kas uzjundī kaislības un greizsirdību, kļūst bīstama visiem iesaistītajiem.

programme.title: Fabelmeni
programme.desc: Augot Arizonā pēc Otrā pasaules kara, jaunais Semijs Fabelmens pusaudža gados vēlas kļūt par kinorežisoru. Drīz vien viņš atklāj satriecošu ģimenes noslēpumu un pēta, kā filmu spēks var palīdzēt viņam saskatīt patiesību.

programme.title: Brauciet ar ērgli
programme.desc: Leifam pēc atsvešinātās mātes Hanijas nāves palicis mantojums. Pirms viņš var pārcelties uz viņas gleznaino Josemītu namiņu, puisim jāizpilda viņas sarežģītais un dažreiz apšaubāmais darbu saraksts.

programme.title: Balstīts uz patiesiem notikumiem
programme.desc: Rakstniece pārdzīvo grūtu periodu pēc savas jaunākās grāmatas izdošanas, jo viņa sasaistās ar pārlieku uzmācīgu pielūdzēju.

programme.title: Neredzamais viesis
programme.desc: Jauns uzņēmējs pamostas no iekšpuses aizslēgtā viesnīcas numurā, blakus esot mīļotās līķim. Viņš nolīgst prestižu juristu, un vienas nakts laikā, intensīvi strādājot, noskaidro, kas noticis šajā trakotajā periodā.

programme.title: Viņš un viņa
programme.desc: Sāra un Viktors ir kopā vairāk nekā 45 gadus. Kā viņi to izdarīja? Kas īsti ir Sāra, šī mīklainā sieviete, kura vienmēr ir bijusi sava vīra ēnā? Mīlestība, ambīcijas un noslēpumi veicina šī neparastā pāra odiseju.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Island Livin. Robert Irvine goes to Catalina Island for the new tourism season and celebrates the island getting back on its feet. Plus, he helps a restaurant open with a bang.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: Pumpkin carving is one of the most fun activities during autumn season. But these individuals take it to the next level, creating real works of art out of their pumpkins. Watch them compete in a series of fun challenges for a great cash prize. They transform the pumpkins into various spooky things, from monsters to zombies and more.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jo makes BBQ pulled pork sandwiches, corn on the cob with charred jalapeño garlic butter and peach cobbler with actress Angela Kinsey.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Tastes Like Summer. Michael Symon kicks off summer with fried clams with tartar dipping sauce, corn and avocado salad, and Lizs sweet corn panna cotta.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Girl and The Goat. Selena Gomez steps up her game in Stephanie Izards kitchen. For her special, Selena makes a ricotta toast inspired by cheese and crackers.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez and Shirley Chung make a fusion version of a beloved childhood dish. Later, Selena tries to deliver a dish good enough for the Ms Chis menu.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez feels the pressure at Alta, Keith Corbins California restaurant. Later, she makes a fried fish dish for Atlas toughest critic, Renee Corbin.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Moos Craft Barbecue. Selena Gomez tries the best Texas BBQ in Los Angeles at Moos Craft Barbecue. Then, Selena puts her own spin on their meat-centric menu.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Cooking show.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Girls Vs Boys. The chefs travel to a Tuscan vineyard where they are challenged to create a three-course menu incorporating truffles and wine pairings.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon creates a meal that kids will love. He makes a dairy-free tomato soup with parm crisps, BLT lettuce wraps and chocolate cake donuts.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Inspired by her honeymoon in Maine, Joanna makes lobster rolls, hush puppies, wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and cherries jubilee.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna makes an Italian meal including pink baked ziti, roasted garlic parmesan toast and antipasto salad with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Cooking show.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Girls Vs Boys. The chefs travel to a Tuscan vineyard where they are challenged to create a three-course menu incorporating truffles and wine pairings.

programme.title: Cake Masters
programme.desc: Americas most in demand cake designer, Duff Goldman, has a long list of A-list Hollywood stars all desperate for the cake of their dreams. This reality TV series follows Goldmans new Los Angeles bakery and the cakes that it creates for its rich and famous clientele. Whether he is making a cake with a panorama of Los Angeles for a million-dollar gala or making a playable guitar cake, Duff Goldman and his crew aim to make edible works of art unlike anything that has been seen before. The Hollywood elite love these cakes and their demands range from hilarious to scary but it does not scare the bakers, if anything it spurs them on.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

programme.title: Saraksts
programme.desc: Kad viņas līgavainis pārguļ ar slavenību no sava sapņu saraksta, Ebija dodas uz Losandželosu, bruņojusies vienīgi ar pieciem vārdiem un tādām fantāzijām kā miljoniem citu parastu cilvēku, lai pārgulētu ar kādu no sava saraksta.

programme.title: Mīlestība un citas narkotikas
programme.desc: Megija, dodoties pie ārsta uz vizīti, iepazīstas ar Džeimiju, kurš ir ļoti izskatīgs un pašpārliecināts farmācijas firmas darbinieks. Drīz starp abiem uzvirmo kaisle, kurai viņi nolemj ļauties, bet drīz vien izrādās, ka abus saista ne tikai tas vien - abi "balodīši" ir nokļuvuši visstiprāko narkotiku - mīlestības ietekmē. Tomēr vai mīlasstāstam iespējamas skaistas beiga, ja Megija ir nedziedināmi slima?

programme.title: Sliktie kaimiņi
programme.desc: Maks (Sets Rogens) un Kellija (Roza Bairna) gaida otru bērnu un nolemj pārvākties uz citurieni. Viņu plānam traucē Šelbija (Hloja Greisa Moreca), kura mēģina nodibināt studenšu klubu, lai viņa ar draugiem varētu rīkot savas ballītes. Abas grupas drīzumā kļūst par zvērinātiem ienaidniekiem, jo atšķiras to uzskati par skaļu mūziku un nepārtrauktu dzerstiņu. Maks un Kellija drīz sauc palīgā bijušo ienaidnieku Tediju (Zaks Efrons), lai neļautu kubam "Kappa Nu" turpināt traucēt dzīvi apkārtnē.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons filma: Fermagedons
programme.desc: Netālu no auniņa Šona fermas ir avarējis piemīlīgās un draiskās citplanētietes Lu-Las kosmosa kuģis. Lu-Las neparasto spēju, nebeidzamo blēņu un galaktikas mēroga atraugu apburts, Šons nolemj palīdzēt savai jauniegūtajai draudzenei atgriezties mājās, nenojaušot, ka nežēlīga citplanētiešu mednieku organizācija jau dzen viņiem pēdas. Vai Šons un viņa bars spēs novērst Fermagedonu, pirms nav par vēlu?

programme.title: La La Land. Kalifornijas sapņi
programme.desc: Uz šosejas Losandželosā jauniņā aktrise Mia saķeras ar džeza pianistu Sebastianu. Pēc tam izgāžas arī viņas noklausīšanās lomai. Vakarā Mias istabas biedri aizved viņu uz ballīti, kurā Mia cerēja izklaidēties, taču atklāj, ka viņas mašīna ir aizvesta, tādēļ mājās jādodas ar kājām. Sebastians uzstāšanās laikā restorānā sāk aizrautīgi improvizēt, lai gan īpašnieks ir piekodinājis spēlēt tikai tradicionālās Ziemassvētku dziesmas. Mia ienāk restorānā tieši tajā brīdī, kad Sebastianu atlaiž par nepaklausību. Pēc kāda laika Mia satiek Sebastianu ballītē, kur viņš kopā ar kādu grupu spēlē muzikālo pavadījumu. Pēc pasākuma abi dodas uz savām automašīnām un, ignorējot nepārprotamo pievilkšanos savā starpā, viens par otru zobojas. Viņi satiekas vēl pāris reizes un sāk just viens pret otru simpātijas. Pēc kāda laika viņi abi sāk dzīvot kopā, Mia raksta monolugu vienai aktrisei, bet Sebastians regulāri spēlē džeza klubā. Sebastians sāk spēlēt drauga grupā, kura kļūst publikas iemīļota. Mia un Sebastians sastrīdas grupas pirmās turnejas laikā. Pēc kāda cita liktenīga strīda viņi izšķiras. Mias luga ir neveiksmīga, un, nespēdama samaksāt teātra īri, Mia dodas atpakaļ uz Nevadu. Sebastians saņem zvanu no režisora, kurš aicina Miu uz noklausīšanos. Sebastians pārliecina Miu tur doties. Abi viens otram apsola, ka vienmēr mīlēs viens otru, taču pagaidām nav pārliecināti par kopīgo nākotni. Pēc pieciem gadiem Mia ir precējusies ar citu vīrieti un viņiem ir bērns. Kādu nakti viņi nokļūst džeza bārā, un Mia saprot, ka tas pieder Sebastianam. Sebastians ierauga Miu un nospēlē kopējo mīlas dziesmu. Abi šajā brīdī apcer, kā būtu bijis, ja viņu attiecības būtu nostrādājušas. Pirms Mia dodas prom, viņa uzsmaida Sebastianam.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Bāreņi Felīsija (Elle Faninga) un Viktors (Deins Dehāns) dzīvo 19. gs. Francijā, un abi mēģina īstenot savus sapņus. Viņš strādā Gustava Eifeļa birojā un grib kļūt par ievērojamu izgudrotāju. Viņa, neskatoties uz līdzekļu trūkumu, ar apkopējas Odetes (Kerlija Reja Džepsena) palīdzību tikusi uzņemta prestižajā Parīzes Operā. Felīsijas iedzimtais talants neiepatīkas viņas konkurentei Kamillai (Medija Cīglere) un pārējiem dejotājiem. Neskatoties uz grūtībām, Felīsija ir apņēmusies kļūt par Parīzes baleta zvaigzni!

programme.title: Dzīve gada laikā
programme.desc: Kad 17 gadus vecais Darils uzzina, ka viņa draudzene drīzumā varētu nomirt, viņš nolemj viņai sniegt viņas dzīves labāko pieredzi, piedāvājot pilnībā izbaudīt atlikušo gadu, kas viņai palicis šajā saulē.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Kaskadieris
programme.desc: Kolts ir kaskadieris, un, tāpat kā visi kaskadieri, darbā viņš tiek spridzināts, sašauts, avarē, lec laukā pa logiem un krīt no augstākajām virsotnēm – tas viss mūsu izklaidei. Tagad šim strādnieku šķiras varonim pēc negadījuma, kas teju maksā viņam dzīvību, ir jāatrod pazudusi kinozvaigzne, jāatrisina sazvērestība uzņemšanas laukumā un jāmēģina atgūt mūža mīlestība Džodija, vienlaikus darot savu ikdienas darbu. Kas te var nenoiet greizi?

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Nakts un diena
programme.desc: Vientuļa sieviete lidostā satiek pievilcīgu svešinieku. Sākotnēji šķietami nevainīgā tikšanās pēkšņi apgriež viņas dzīvi ar kājām gaisā, jo svešinieks izrādās slepens spiegs. Džūna tiek ierauta galvu reibinošos piedzīvojumos un bīstamā ceļojumā apkārt pasaulei, jo viņas ceļabiedram ir jāveic ārkārtīgi atbildīga misija un jānosargā baterija, kas var kļūt par mūžīgās enerģijas avotu.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs – slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: Ragana
programme.desc: Ir 17. gs. 30. gadi Jaunanglijā. Viljamam (Ralfs Ainsons) un viņa ģimenei draud izraidīšana no ciemata, jo radies strīds ar baznīcu par Jauno Derību, tādēļ ģimene nolemj pamest ciematu. Galu galā viņi apmetas fermā savāda meža malā. Kad iet bojā iesētais, ģimene viens otru tur aizdomās paranojas iespaidā un ģimenes aizdomas vēršas pret meitu Tomasinu (Anja Tailore-Džoja). Ģimenes un fermas locekļiem liecoties zem savu aizdomu smaguma, Tomasinu sāk apsūdzēt raganu burvestībās.

programme.title: Tuksneša prinči
programme.desc: Berberu puisēna un viņa drauga kamieļa piedzīvojumi, šķērsojot tuksnesi.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Mēs atkal esam klāt
programme.desc: Pēc Donnas nāves Sofija gatavojas piepildīt mātes ilgi loloto sapni – atvērt viesnīcu. Tomēr gaidāmos svētkus aizēno domstarpības ar Skaju, kurš strādā Ņujorkā un pat nenojauš par... gaidāmo bērniņu! Kā Sofija tiks ar visu galā viena pati? Par laimi, palīgā nāk mammas draudzenes, kuras izstāsta Sofijai, ar kādu drosmi un pārliecību savulaik šai vietā jaunu dzīvi uzsāka viņas māte. Tālajā 1979. gadā jaunā Donna nupat kā bija absolvējusi universitāti un gatavojās ceļot pa pasauli. Parīzē viņa satika Hariju, kurš, par spīti savam naivumam, viņu spēja apburt. Vēlāk, nokavējusi prāmi uz Kalokairi, Donna iepazinās ar Bilu, kurš piedāvāja viņu aizvest. Un tad... Tad Donna sastapa Semu, kurā neprātīgi iemīlējās, taču viņš salauza Donnas sirdi, bet ne spēcīgo garu.

programme.title: Smurfi
programme.desc: Laipni lūdzam smurfu pasaulē! Burvis Gargamels ir piespiedis smurfus bēgt no dzimtā ciema. Ģimenes komēdija, kurā animācijas filmas varoņi parādās spēlfilmā.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons. Filma
programme.desc: Kad Šons izlemj veltīt dienu atpūtai un izklaidei, viņu sagaida daudz vairāk piedzīvojumu, nekā viņš būtu gribējis. Pārpratums, kurā iesaistīts fermeris, karavāna un ļoti stāvs kalns, aizved Šonu uz Lielo pilsētu. Tagad Šonam un viņa ganāmpulkam ir jāatrod ceļš atpakaļ mājup, kur viņus gaida māju zaļā zāle.

programme.title: Pūķi: Nakts fūrijas dāvana
programme.desc: Vikingu pilsēta Berka, kas tagad izbauda jauno aliansi ar pūķiem, gatavojas saviem ikgadējiem ziemas saulgriežu svētkiem. Tomēr svētku gars tiek apdraudēts, kad visi pūķi, izņemot Nezobu, nezināma iemesla dēļ pēkšņi aizlido. Kamēr Astrīda neveiksmīgi mēģina atrisināt šo problēmu, Hikaps nolemj uztaisīt Nezobam jaunu protēzi, lai viņš varētu lidot patstāvīgi. Tomēr, tuvojoties svētkiem, Hikaps uzzina pūķu noslēpumu un meklē risinājumu, kā tos atvest mājās.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Dinozauriņš Diplodoks
programme.desc: Titulētais dinozauriņš dodas piedzīvojumā, lai glābtu savus vecākus, kuri pazuduši mīklainos apstākļos. Ceļā viņš sastaps ne vien burvi un divus dīvainus zinātniekus, bet arī fantastiskas būtnes un nokļūs apbrīnojamās vietās.

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montanezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, palīdzēja sapurināt pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Pavadonis
programme.desc: Lai pārdzīvotu vispārējo kāzu drudzi, kas pārņēmis vasaru, divi neprecēti draugi Bens un Alise nolemj būt viens otra pavadoņi katrās kāzās, kurās viņi ir ielūgti.

programme.title: Biškopis
programme.desc: Viena cilvēka nežēlīga, atriebības vadīta cīņa iegūst valstiskus apmērus, kad atklājas, ka viņš bijis aģents ietekmīgā un slepenā organizācijā, kas pazīstama ar nosaukumu "Biškopji".

programme.title: Ir laiks
programme.desc: Kad Timam aprit 21 gads, tēvs atklāj puisim neticamu ģimenes noslēpumu: visi viņu dzimtas vīrieši spēj atgriezties pagātnē. Tims var atgriezties jebkurā savas dzīves brīdī, lai panāktu, ka viss notiek nevainojami. Puisis izlemj izmantot šīs īpašās spējas, lai iekarotu daiļās Mērijas sirdi, taču izrādās, ka īsta mīlestība var būt līdz smieklīgumam neparedzama pat tad, ja ir iespēja visu neskaitāmas reizes atkārtot no jauna.

programme.title: Killers. Pēdējā misija
programme.desc: Algots slepkava ir atšvešinājies no dēla un sirgst ar demenci, kas strauji attīstās. Viņam tiek piedāvāta iespēja izpirkt savus grēkus, glābjot dēla dzīvību.

programme.title: Nedžentlmeniskas karadarbības ministrija
programme.desc: Neticams un noklusēts patiess stāsts par pašu pirmo īpašo spēku organizāciju, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā dibināja Vinstons Čērčils un neliela militāro ierēdņu grupa. Slepenā kaujas vienība, ko veidoja raibum raiba neliešu un disidentu kompānija, devās riskantā misijā pret nacistiem, izmantojot neierastas un pilnībā "nedžentlmeniskas" cīņas tehnikas. Viņu bezbailīgā pieeja mainīja kara gaitu un ielika pamatus mūsdienu slepeno operāciju karadarbībai.

programme.title: LaLiga. Valencia - Athletic Club
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. Marseille - PSG
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin renovate a Cliff May home to fit a couples modern lifestyle, and the historic house presents plenty of budget challenges.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin renovate a home in South LA, and having grown up in the area, Austins excited to take part in the rebirth of this historic location.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Bargain Block New Orleans
programme.desc: The pressure is on as Keith and Evan take on their final duplex. They plan to weave two of the citys major influences on opposing sides of the house.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Home Town (Mothers Day Special
programme.desc: Ben and Erin want to surprise a friend by creating a nursery for her in only two weeks. Meanwhile, Ben plans a surprise of his own for Erin.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Weve been fascinated by our nearest planetary neighbor, Venus. Its about the same size as our world, covered in massive volcanoes and poisonous clouds of acid rain. Is Venus our evil twin or a warning about what Earth will become in the future?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hitting the road to look for treasures in Tampa, Florida. Helming a crew of experts, the guys will plunder everything from Pokemon cards to Steve McQueens motorcycle, hoping to make waves in the Sunshine State.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a fisherman capture footage of a giant sea serpent known as "Caddy?" Whats the explanation for the mysterious blue and green flashing lights, witnessed by hundreds of people, in Lubbock, Texas in August of 1951?

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed with Danny Trejo
programme.desc: From a Chinese curse that turns out to be real, to mysterious island in Central Asia with enough pathogens to kill the entire global population several times over...we uncover some of the worlds most dangerous and deadly accidental discoveries.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings are still missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: From massive asteroids and deadly bursts of radiation to microscopic alien viruses, each cosmic dangers may end human civilization as we know it. Can we prepare for the inevitable calamity that may be coming our way? Or are we doomed to oblivion?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The gigantic statues of Easter Island have mystified humanity for centuries. How in the world did an ancient civilisation, with only primitive tools, carve and then move thousands of these rock monuments around the island… and why?

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Surfers by day and cat burglars by night, this trio of thieves is in New York to steal priceless jewels from the American Museum of Natural History. Their bold plan has them creeping along the museum ledge, 125 feet above the streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to Louisville to bet on a collection of vintage spirits, a pair of goggles signed by Kentucky Derby jockey Jon Court, and a vintage pedal car. Later, they visit the Louisville Slugger factory, for a home run of a surprise.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The gigantic statues of Easter Island have mystified humanity for centuries. How in the world did an ancient civilisation, with only primitive tools, carve and then move thousands of these rock monuments around the island… and why?

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: A jogger vanishes from the top of Mt Marathon in Alaska and a witness describes seeing a monstrous, airplane-sized raptor around the time of the disappearance. Could ancient stories of the Thunderbird be true?

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.desc: A jogger vanishes from the top of Mt Marathon in Alaska and a witness describes seeing a monstrous, airplane-sized raptor around the time of the disappearance. Could ancient stories of the Thunderbird be true?
